title: Drawing, "Decorative Design with Figure", ca. 1800
medium: Pen and brown ink over graphite traces on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark: feet of bird over triple mount in segment
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Woman shown in profile directed toward right seated and painting. Globe stands upon pedestal, at right; books at left.
